pci_projects_project_quota_protect_expla: The resources for your cloud project are limited, so that you can control your resource consumption.
pci_projects_project_quota_protect_more: If you need more resources, you can order cloud credit or request them from our team by clicking on the buttons below.
pci_projects_project_quota_loading_error: Oops. We were unable to retrieve the list of quotas.
pci_projects_project_quota_restricted_ac: This quota is limited as there is currently no active payment method on your account.
Please add a valid payment method, then come back to this page to increase your quota.
pci_projects_project_quota_restricted_pa: There is now an active payment method on your account.
pci_projects_project_quota_already_unlea: You have already activated your quota.
pci_projects_project_quota_unleash_error: Oops. We were unable to activate your quota.
pci_projects_project_quota_autoscaling_e: An error has occurred updating the auto-scaling quota.
pci_projects_project_quota_autoscaling_h: Your quota will be automatically increased depending on your usage, and based on a certain number of criteria.
